Package org.simonwells.CellularAutomata

Class Summary
App Driver class & main method for the cellular automata application
AppProperties Properties class used to set parameters for the application
Cell A basic element of a Cellular Automata
CellCluster Groups Cell objects together so that the state of their offspring can be calculated.
CellularAutomata Controls the evolution of the Cellular Automata in terms of a sequence of generations
Generation Encapsulates a generation of Cells
Output Controls the display of the CA
Pattern Describes the calculation used to determine the status of the child of a given cluster of Cell objects
